entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 7:54 PM MST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 1.
